description: It reports "12 imports missing in this test environment" when running the command to check PEP8 and HACKING compliance:    ./run_tests.sh -p
title: PEP8 and HACKING compliance test reports '12 imports missing in this test environment'

comments.content: It reports "12 imports missing in this test environment" when running the command to check PEP8 and HACKING compliance:    ./run_tests.sh -p
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhang-hare

comments.content: This isn't a bug exactly.  Some of the tests require certain dependencies (qpid for example), and the tests are skipped when the non-essential dependencies are installed.  The note is just to let you know that it couldn't check those imports for HACKING compliance because they are not installed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
